definition: to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]

trembling voice/see also 顫聲|颤声[chan4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Trembling as the wind blew, which told of his joy of reunion to me by the dense aroma of white lotus.
sentences.chinese: 风颤颤，用白荷酽酽的花香告诉我重逢的喜悦。

sentences.english: He began to breathe at last, but his voice was unsteady.
sentences.chinese: 他终于开始吸上一口气，但他的声音听来颤颤微微的。

sentences.english: Does the sight of a cheerful jelly jar with daisies make your lover smile contentedly?
sentences.chinese: 一个画着雏菊的果冻罐会让你的爱人笑得花枝乱颤？

sentences.english: The Su proper Er admires a body not from F ground Zhan because a while, she is truly very somnolent to feel.
sentences.chinese: 苏宜尔哈身不由己地颤了一下，她真的是很想睡觉啊。

sentences.english: Dreamseed - Gain harmonic attunement with the low vibrational sounds of the didgeridoo .
sentences.chinese: 以底哲里度的低颤音频让您获得和谐的平衡。

sentences.english: Even if we have safe belt will still feel wrought up.
sentences.chinese: 即使挂着保险带你也会心颤肉跳。

sentences.english: You stood there, eyes on me. I trembled at the sparkles, brighter than the light.
sentences.chinese: 君站立一旁，美目探妾，妾莹灯下颤颤而立。

sentences.english: You stood there, eyes on me. I trembled at the sparkles, brighter than the light.
sentences.chinese: 君站立一旁，美目探妾，妾莹灯下颤颤而立。

sentences.english: Office workers ran for their lives as an earth tremor shook the center of town.
sentences.chinese: 地颤使镇中心摇晃时，工作人员都各自逃命。

sentences.english: Her top notes quavered a little.
On the lofty heights, the pure light of mind could be seen flickering.
sentences.chinese: 人们望见在宁静的顶峰上闪颤着思想的纯洁光辉。

sentences.english: Our lamp had flickered in the evening breeze and died.
sentences.chinese: 我们的灯在晚风中颤摇着熄灭了。

sentences.english: With a shudder of disgust the lawyer went into the dining room and closed the door into the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 律师厌恶地打了一个颤，走进餐厅，关上厨房的门。

sentences.english: All of seven Yans are a light Zhan, a pair of beauteous Mous almost can project ice.
sentences.chinese: 七焰全是轻颤，一双美眸几乎可以射出冰来。

sentences.english: The true meaning is often lost in advertising hype.
sentences.chinese: 其真正的含义惊颤在天花乱坠的广告宣传中消失了。
珂赛特听了好不心惊肉颤。

definition: trill (of voice)/see also 顫聲|颤声[zhan4 sheng1]
trembling voice/see also 顫聲|颤声[chan4 sheng1]
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
to tremble/to shiver/uncontrolled shaking of the body
to tremble/to shake out/to reveal/to make it in the world
very slight sound/rustling (onom.)/to stream down (of tears)/luxuriant growth (of vegetation)
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
